specific_question: How many patients do we expect to engage through AI-driven personalization by Q2 2025?
answer: We expect to engage 40,000 patients through AI-driven personalization by Q2 2025.
justification: Quantifying patient engagement helps assess the effectiveness of new CRM solutions.
dr_question: How can MediConn Solutions leverage trendy new CRM solutions to improve patient engagement and retention, and what new CRM solutions are expected in 2025?
